summary: Add a staff enchanter into Severin Manor.  Also clean up and decorate the crafting room.ver2.0 : Add green house. 32 fertile soils are available.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#fce5cd][size=5]As we know, Severin Manor is suitable place for any kind of crafting.[/size][/color]
[/font][size=3]...wait, where's a staff enchanter?
Besides, what a dark and dusty forge!?

This mod add a staff enchanter and green house in Severin Manor.
Clean up and decorate the forge area.
Combat dummys are replaced to trophy booth.
Of course add some lighting and improve dungeon-like BGM.
[b][color=#e06666]*Notice: this mod is merged into [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88079]"Severin Manor is Your Own Home"[/url] please see it too.[/color][/b]

[/size][b][color=#e69138][size=3]Change Log[/size][/color][/b][size=3]
[/size][size=3]ver 2.0  Add green house beside the alchemy lab.
            32 fertile soils are available. (DLC Hearthfire is Required)[/size]
[size=3]ver 1.01  Adjust some bad aligned object. Add [/size][size=3]ceil lanterns (just I forgot.)
[/size][size=3]
[b][color=#a4c2f4]Compatibility (confirmed within my personal usage) [/color][/b][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Fully works with my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73026?]"Severin Manor Kitchen" [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74167/?]"Severin Manor Bathroom"[/url][/size]
[*][size=3]Well works with Jokerine's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47751/?]"Severin Manor -Garden in Basement"[/url][/size]
[*][size=3]Also works with uglydemon's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31167/?]"Severin Manor Improvements" (Lite & No-Manequins ver.)[/url][/size]
[/list]
[size=3]I wish our Solstheim life will get more fruitful : )[/size]
author: Pumpkin Pie
